item.description:
Saturday Evening, April 13th, 2013

Reception at Polcari’s – Route One North Saugus

Last  Show at Giggles Comedy Club – Route One South Saugus

Special Event: Featuring local comics-  Steve Sweeney & Lenny Clarke

Back by popular demand – we are excited to announce our third comedy night and antipasto reception. To  those that attended our comedy night mixers last year, we know we don’t have to tell you how great these events are.

Our evening begins  at 7:30PM at Polcari’s on Route One in Saugus where attendees will have a chance to meet and mingle with other local singles while enjoying  delicious antipasto and gourmet pizza.  Then we will head just down the road to catch the last show of  a special event at Giggles Comedy Club featuring local talent Lenny Clarke AND Steve Sweeney. It’s a great chance to see your fellow guests in a new light, meet some new friends and certainly have more than a few laughs.  Before heading home, we invite you to join us for live music and  dancing at JP’s lounge.

This fun and light-hearted evening includes food and show admission as well as our usual gender parity and reason to head out and just have fun!  Please join us. 


Early Price $79

Limited spaces offered thru meetup.  All Sales Final, sorry no exceptions!

Ticket Cost $79.00

Call us for help with your rsvp at 617-475-0423 - thank you!

For  additional information - visit: introductionsbydiana.com

By purchasing a ticket for, and/or attending an event by Introductions By Diana LLC, you agree to release, forever discharge and hold harmless Introductions By Diana LLC, its agents and its employees for any and all liability, claims or demands of any nature whatsoever, either in law or in equity which may arise directly or indirectly from said event or any other services provided by Introductions By Diana LLC.

You thereby discharge Introductions By Diana LLC from any liability or claim for damages of any nature whatsoever, whether direct, indirect, general, special, compensatory, consequential, and/or incidental, which may arise directly or indirectly from said event or any other services provided by Introductions By Diana LLC.

Introductions By Diana LLC does not conduct background investigations or other investigations of any nature, or otherwise screen attendees to its events.  Please exercise sound judgment and common sense if providing personal information to other attendees, or meeting them outside of an Introductions By Diana LLC event.

Introductions By Diana LLC reserves the right to deny the sale of its services in its sole discretion, at any time, for any reason.
item.name: Welcome Singles 40-60 - Comedy Night and Reception Party!
